Test Name: MAYOCOMPLETE Kidney Cancer Panel, Next-Generation Sequencing, Tumor
Specimen Type: Fresh frozen tumor tissue, formalin-fixed paraffin-embedded (FFPE) tissue blocks, or slides with tumor tissue
Purpose: To detect and analyze genetic mutations associated with kidney cancer using next-generation sequencing on tumor specimens.
Container: Cryovial for fresh frozen tissue, FFPE tissue block, or microscope slide
Equipment: Next-generation sequencer, DNA extraction and library preparation kits, PCR thermocycler, Qubit fluorometer/Bioanalyzer, clean bench, and bioinformatics computational tools
